en..instructions: Move the values from the stack to the tree. Color the nodes and balance the tree using rotations when it becomes necessary.
en.av_insert: 1. Search (top-down) and insert the new item u as in a Binary Search Tree.
en.av_root_black: 2.1 If u is root, make it black and the algorithm ends or
en.av_parent_black: 2.2 if its parent t is black, the algorithm ends
en.av_change_colours:
2.3.1. [change colors] If t and its sibling v are red:
  Color t and v black and their parent p red.
  Continue the algorithm with p if necessary.
en.av_rotation_1: 2.3.2. [rotations] If t is red and v black, perform a rotation.
en.av_rotation_2:
2.3.2. [rotations] If t is red and v black, perform a rotation.
Unbalanced black node p is highlighted.
en.av_lr_rotation:
ROTATION:
  if (p.left == t) and (p.left.right == u), LR-double rotation in p;
en.av_r_rotation:
ROTATION:
  if (p.left == t) and (p.left.left == u), single rotation right in p;
en.av_l_rotation:
ROTATION:
  if (p.right == t) and (p.right.right == u), single rotation left in p;
en.av_rl_rotation:
ROTATION:
  if (p.right == t) and (p.right.left == u), RL-double rotation in p.
en.av_colour_after_rotation: After the rotation, p and its new parent exchange their colors.

fi..instructions: Lisää pinon avaimet alla olevaan punamustaan hakupuuhun. Muuta solmujen väriä ja tasapainota puuta aina kun se on tarpeellista.
fi.av_insert: 1. Hae (juuresta lehteen) alkion paikka puussa ja lisää alkio kuten binäärisessä hakupuussa.
fi.av_root_black: 2.1 Jos u on juuri, väritä se mustaksi ja lopeta.
fi.av_parent_black: 2.2 Jos u:n vanhempi t on musta, lopeta.
fi.av_change_colours:
2.3.1. [värinvaihto] Jos sekä t että sen sisarsolmu v ovat punaisia,
  väritä t ja v mustiksi ja niiden vanhempi p punaiseksi.
  Jos p:n isä on punainen, jatka algoritmia p:lle.
fi.av_rotation_1: 2.3.2. [rotaatio] Jos t on punainen ja v musta, tee rotaatio.
fi.av_rotation_2:
2.3.2. [rotaatio] Jos t on punainen ja v musta, tee rotaatio.
Tasapainottamaton musta solmu p on korostettu.
fi.av_lr_rotation:
ROTAATIO:
  Jos (p.left == t) ja (p.left.right == u), tee LR-kaksoisrotaatio p:ssä.
fi.av_r_rotation:
ROTAATIO:
  Jos (p.left == t) ja (p.left.left == u), tee yksinkertainen rotaatio oikealle p:ssä.
fi.av_l_rotation:
ROTAATIO:
  Jos (p.right == t) ja (p.right.right == u),tee yksinkertainen rotaatio vasemmalle p:ssä.
fi.av_rl_rotation:
ROTAATIO:
  Jos (p.right == t) ja (p.right.left == u), tee RL-kaksoisrotaatio p:ssä.
fi.av_colour_after_rotation: Rotaation jälkeen p ja p:n uusi isä vaihtavat värejä.

english: 1. Search (top-down) and insert the new item u as in a Binary Search Tree.
2. Return (bottom-up) and
2.1 If u is root, make it black and the algorithm ends or
2.2 if its parent t is black, the algorithm ends
2.3 If both u and its parent t are red, do one of the following:
2.3.1. [change colors] If t and its sibling v are red:
Color t and v black and their parent p red.
Continue the algorithm with p if necessary.
2.3.2. [rotations] If t is red and v black, perform a rotation.
After the rotation, p and its new parent exchange their colors.
There are no longer two consequtive red nodes in the tree.
ROTATION:
1 While the recursion returns, keep track of
node p,
p's child t and
p's grandchild u within the path from inserted node to p.
2 If rotation is needed in p, do one of the following rotations:
if (p.left == t) and (p.left.left == u), single rotation right in p;
if (p.right == t) and (p.right.right == u), single rotation left in p;
if (p.left == t) and (p.left.right == u), LR-double rotation in p; or
if (p.right == t) and (p.right.left == u), RL-double rotation in p.
